LanguageData.MechCluster.label: mech cluster
LanguageData.MechCluster.arrivedLetter: There is a cluster of hostile mechanoids and their combat support structures in this area.\n\nThe cluster can include artillery, turrets, combat mechanoids, and other support and defense structures.
LanguageData.MechClusterForceNoConditionCauser.label: mech cluster
LanguageData.MechClusterForceNoConditionCauser.arrive: There is a cluster of hostile mechanoids and their combat support structures in this area.\n\nThe cluster can include artillery, turrets, combat mechanoids, and other support and defense structures.
LanguageData.RaidSource.label: raid source
LanguageData.RaidSource.description: A guarded military staging area which sends periodic raids.
LanguageData.RaidSource.arrivedLetter: There is an enemy outpost in this area.
LanguageData.SunBlocker.label: sun blocker
LanguageData.SunBlocker.description: A sun blocker machine which turns the sky opaque.

LanguageData.ToxicSpewer.label: toxic spewer
